Class FileCategories

  org.catechis.file.FileCategories
All Implemented Interfaces:
Categories
public class FileCategories
extends java.lang.Object
implements Categories

* Replaced by FileWordCategoriesManager * This class was created to create file specific methods to used categories or words.

This object is not threadsafe.

getSortedWordCategories2

public java.util.Hashtable getSortedWordCategories2(java.lang.String user_name,
                                                    java.lang.String encoding)
Returns a Hashtable with the keys as the first test date found by searching all the words for the earliest date of entry. The file name has the .xml extension attached.

getWords

public java.util.Vector getWords(java.lang.String file_name,
                                 java.lang.String folder,
                                 java.lang.String user_name)

Returns a vector of Word objects gotten from JDOMSolution The folder argument was included when we were considering creating a suv-folder for words, but we havent got there yet.

addCategory

public void addCategory(java.lang.String category,
                        java.lang.String root_path,
                        java.lang.String user_name)

A calling method has to know not to put the .xml on the end of the new file name, as in the future, we hope such thngs will be done in a db.

Previously we have kepy JDOM specific methods out of the interface-based objects, but JDOMSolution has become huge, so it seemed like a better thing to do memory wise was just do some of the work here. When we create, say

a HibernateCategories object, it can implement addCategories any way it wants.

Specified by:
addCategory in interface Categories
